details.licence_short_description: The licences and permits you need to mix different categories of special waste or mix special waste with non-special waste.
details.licence_overview:
If you dispose of, recover, collect or transport special waste in Scotland,Â you must not mix different categories of special waste or mix special waste with non-special waste unless you have:

  • a waste management licence
  • authorisation under Part 1 of the Environmental Protection Act 1990
  • a pollution prevention and control permit
